column4: man can someone please please let me know if skype has issues with regards to showing contacts - none of mine appear on this box but theyre available on my windows box
i don't get that problem with skype. are you using stable release or beta?
hm.. i avoid using the beta. have you checked www.skpye.com? i'm sure i remember seeing the .deb package there
yeh you should. give it a shot. remove it from synaptic first, then install the current release http://www.skype.com/download/skype/linux/choose/
